content: this bag is really beginner friendly and easy it probably took me a couple of hours to make one start to finish this pattern includes an 5 page written pattern and a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #3 light weight yarn i used lion brand comfy cotton blend #3 light weight yarn crochet hook size 5 mm scissors yarn needle yarn needed 120 yards gauge 16 half_double_crochet x 10 row = 4 17 st double_crochet & chain x 7 row = 4 measurements 16 94 circumference x 10 tall thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
